translations: n.修正（amendment 的复数）；修正案

sentences.sentence: She made several minor amendments to her essay.
sentences.translation: 她对自己的论文作了几处小的修改。

sentences.sentence: Please propose amendments and addenda to the first draft of the document.
sentences.translation: 请对这个文件的初稿提出修改和补充意见。

sentences.sentence: MPs voted overwhelmingly in favour of Labour amendments to the children and families bill last February that included the power to regulate for plain packaging.
sentences.translation: 去年2月，国会议员以压倒性的多数投票支持工党对《儿童与家庭法案》的修正案，其中包括对无装饰包装的监管权力。
